relation: J.D. Drew walked. Runner on first with none out and Dustin Pedroia due up.
Dustin Pedroia singled to right. Runners on first and second with none out and Adrian Gonzalez due up.
Adrian Gonzalez doubled to right scoring J.D. Drew. Runners on second and third with none out and Marco Scutaro due up.
Marco Scutaro reached first on a fielder's choice. On the play, Adrian Gonzalez was tagged out at third from second. Runners on first and third with one out and Darnell McDonald due up.
Darnell McDonald reached first on a fielder's choice to third. Bases loaded with one out and Jed Lowrie due up.
Jed Lowrie's sacrifice fly to center scored Dustin Pedroia. Runners on first and second and with two outs and Carl Crawford due up.
Jason Bulger enters the game for the Angels with runners on first and second and two outs.
Marco Scutaro advanced to third and Darnell McDonald advanced to second on a passed ball. Runners on second and third and with two outs and Carl Crawford at the plate.
Carl Crawford struck out swinging to end the inning.
